rule: The chatbot may return multiple part-of-speech tags that do not correspond to the specified word within the provided sentence.
complianceText:
The description specifies that the output should consist of only a single part of speech tag. The chatbot's output contains two tags: "VB" and "VBG". This constitutes a violation of the requirement to return just one part of speech tag per word. Therefore, the output is non-compliant with the description because it provides multiple tags instead of strictly one.

ERR
